title: Deprecation of Bid Manager API v1.1
content:
Today weâ€™re announcing the deprecation of the Bid Manager (DBM) API v1.1. This version will be fully sunset on February 28, 2023.

Please migrate to Bid Manager API v2 by the sunset date to avoid an interruption of service. v2 introduced a number of new features and breaking changes, which are listed in our release notes. Here are some of the changes introduced in v2:

  • Updated API endpoints for existing services and methods.
  • Restructured Query and Report resources that use named object types and enums.
  • Added ability to request individual Report objects via queries.reports.get.
  • Added ability to order queries.list and queries.reports.list requests.
  • Improved queries.run behavior to return a Report object instead of an empty response

Follow the steps in our v2 migration guide to help you migrate from v1.1 to v2.

If you run into issues or need help with your migration, please contact us using our support contact form.

- Trevor Mulchay, Display & Video 360 API Team
